resources.string: It is crucial to Bee that all our users follow local road rules. Users must at all times ride in bike lanes and always wear a helmet. Each scooter should have a helmet with it before you start your ride. If a scooter doesn'thave a helmet or the helmet is damaged, please report to us so we can replace it. Also, report any scooters that appear damaged so we can fix them immediately.
Want your own free personal Bee helmet? Contact us so we can send one to your address free of charge.
Step 1: Kick start three times to start moving\n\nStep 2: Then push the throttle button on the right handle with your thumb
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
